name: Techno Mouse Prototype (compiled)
description:
Techno Mouse is an interactive music experiment where the interaction between the player and the gameobjects shape the soundtrack. 

This project was part of my graduation during my study at the University of the Arts of Utrecht (HKU). 

The game can be controlled using only the computer mouse. Just point the mouse cursor into the direction where you'd like the little techno mouse character to go.
